title: Understanding Vitamin D
intro: The body needs nutrients in small amounts to function and stay healthy. Vitamin D helps the body use calcium and phosphorus to build strong bones and teeth. It is fat-soluble...
Vitamin deficiency occurs when your body does not have enough vitamin D...
Vitamin D is required for a variety of biological activities...

content.subtitle: Diet
content.text: People who do not consume enough vitamin D-rich foods, such as fortified dairy products and cereals, may have low levels.

content.subtitle: Smoking
content.text: Deficiency levels are higher in smokers...

sections.title: Treatment
content: To maintain an appropriate vitamin D level in your body, you may also find it helpful to eat more vitamin D-rich foods...

sections.title: Conclusion
content: Vitamin D is essential for the proper health of the body...
